name: J. League Jikkyou Winning Eleven 2000 2nd
summary: J.League Winning Eleven 2000 is the officially licensed action soccer game based on the second stage of the 1998 J.League season. It is the follow-up to J.league '98-99. The series is well known for its smooth gameplay and simplicity of controls. J.League Winning Eleven 2000 2nd features the updated teams of the season 2000-2001.
